wf_workflow_version.description: Manages the no standard request approval process
wf_workflow_version.name: Non Standard Request
wf_workflow_version.on_cancel: // This script executes if the workflow is cancelled.// The global variable context_sys_id contains the sys_id of the cancelled workflow context.

task=3^approval=approved^description=Check on the software manufacturer/vendor website to check compatibility with our systems i.e. Win 7 Ent / Win 10 Ent depending on the software being assessed and what it is being deployed on.
Check the product on Google with "compatibility issues" after the name
Use Work Notes to record anything found that may impact on the compatibility and performance of the software on the users' machine /Sisk network
When done select whether the software is compatible and summarise any issues in the in the fields below^EQ

task=5^approval=approved^description=Check the cost of the licensing of the product and the different licensing options.

When done select whether the cost of software is greater than the amount estimated by the user and document costs in the in the fields below^EQ

task=6^approval=approved^description=Test Install That the software is installed on the same O/S as the proposed user's machine Use Work Notes to record any issues arising from the initial install of the software including ancillary programs that are required to run the install/software i.e SQL 2008
Software test Run Where possible the software is run on the test machine to establish if there any issues /conflicts arising from running the software on the O/S or the current machine image Use Work Notes to record any issues arising from the initial tests
When done select whether IT Testing was completed successfully and summarise ant issues in the fields below^EQ

Software test Run Where possible the software is run on the test machine to establish if there any issues /conflicts arising from running the software on the O/S or the current machine image Use Work Notes to record any issues arising from the initial tests
When done select whether IT Testing was completed successfully and summarise ant issues in the fields below^EQ

task=10^approval=approved^description=Check is there is software that is required Check if software is non standard If software is non standard then a Non Standard Software request is created
Close this task if there is no software, software is standard or software request is complete^EQ

task=2^approval=approved^description=Check on https://www.cvedetails.com/ cut and paste any findings on the product into the Work Notes field
Check the product on Google with "vulnerabilities" "testing" or "Security" after the name to see if anything is found.
Use Work Notes to record anything found that may impact on the security and performance of the software on the Sisk network
When done select whether the software is vulnerable and summarise any issues in the in the fields below^EQ
